imdb.title: Kurau: Phantom Memory
imdb.plot: It's the year 2100, and the moon is now home to a colony of scientists and pioneers. It's also host to dangerous experiments into strange new forms of energy, and it isn't long before one of them goes terribly wrong. In a freak ac...

episodes.title: Hiroi sekai he...
episodes.plot: Years ago, a tragic accident led to Kurau's possession by a Rynax. Now an adult, the Rynax powers she acquired so long ago have made her an unstoppable agent.

episodes.title: A Good Word
episodes.plot: Kurau's latest case forces her to protect a detestable young bridegroom.

episodes.title: Manhunters
episodes.plot: Kurau takes on an extremely dangerous assignment, rescuing a space pilot whose spaceship has gone out of control. There are complications, however. Kurau and Christmas are being watched by the GPO, the police department of the future, and a blonde man, who apparently is a private agent.

episodes.title: Passing Through the Night
episodes.plot: Kurau and Christmas are on the run from the GPO and must leave their old life behind. Kurau gets a job as an agent with a new company, going after a gang of art thieves. When Kurau's new partner is captured, she is forced to rescue him.

episodes.title: Lost Child
episodes.plot: Kurau convalesces from her injuries incurred in her previous case. Christmas takes care of her, doing the cooking and the shopping. Meanwhile, Kurau's father, is forced to use his scientific knowledge of Rynax energy to help the GPO. The GPO hunts a stray Rynax, while Doug hunts for any signs of Kurau, since she vanished from his surveillance.

episodes.title: Shining Rain
episodes.plot: The GPO sets a trap to capture Kurau. Doug, the blonde agent, befriends Christmas and Kurau.

episodes.title: A New Way of Life
episodes.plot: Christmas and Kurau flee to a seaside town, with the help of Doug, where they get jobs working in a restaurant.

episodes.title: Another Christmas
episodes.plot: Kurau gets volunteered to be a POD pilot in the local games. We find out why Ayaka hates the holiday of Christmas.

episodes.title: The Town Where the Angels Disappeared
episodes.plot: Using false identities, Christmas and Kurau flee to Los Angeles. They discover a Rynax energy plant nearby and Kurau decides to investigate. However the GPO has managed to follow them to LA, and the pair find themselves cornered by the GPO.

episodes.title: Sleeping Beauty
episodes.plot: The time finally arrives when Kurau and Christmas are unable to avoid capture by the GPO.

episodes.title: Yobi au koe
episodes.plot: The GPO sets a trap for Kurau, when Kurau travels to the moon to rescue Christmas.

episodes.title: Ima koko ni iru
episodes.plot: Ayaka interviews Doug to find out the location of Kurau and Christmas. Meanwhile, Kurau tries to heal people who have been injured by Rynax energy.

episodes.title: Mamoru beki mono
episodes.plot: Kurau and Christmas escape from the moon on a spaceship piloted by Kurau's friend, Jose. However, the ship is boarded by space pirates.

episodes.title: Kinou, kyou, ashita
episodes.plot: Kurau and Christmas find a safe haven, living with their uncle, Frank and their aunt, Kleine, in Switzerland.

episodes.title: Ageha chou no fuan
episodes.plot: A Rynax boy finds Christmas and tries to make her his pair.

episodes.title: Oka no ue no bohyou
episodes.plot: A girl named, Jessica, who has lost her family in a Rynax energy accident, rescues Yvon.

episodes.title: Kiri no naka
episodes.plot: Kurau rescues Yvon after the GPO captures Jessica. However, Ayaka and the GPO continue their hunt for Yvon.

episodes.title: Raihou sha
episodes.plot: Inspector Wong tells Kurau and Ayaka about the GPO's secret agenda. Ayaka finds out who killed her family, when she was a child.

episodes.title: Sorezore no michi
episodes.plot: Ayaka visits Kurau and Christmas and shares some of her past with Kurau. Kurau and Christmas then travel to France to find two Rynax twins, to try to save them from being captured by the GPO. Ayaka confronts Director Saito.

episodes.title: Mado o hirai te
episodes.plot: The Rynax twins, Windt and Regel, turn out to have no regard for human lives, when they act out their strategy to capture Kurau's Rynax energy.

episodes.title: Kooritsui ta kawa
episodes.plot: Director Saito has perfected his newest crop of GPO soldiers. Kurau and Christmas continue to chase the Delyus twins. The twins, however, manage to separate Kurau and Christmas from each other, leaving them more vulnerable. But the pair are not in this fight alone. Ayaka Steiger has something special up her sleeve, to assist them in capturing the twins.

episodes.title: Yami ni mabataku
episodes.plot: The twins learn what it is to be human. What price will they pay for this unbearable knowledge?

episodes.title: Saigo no hikari
episodes.plot: Windt goes after Director Saito. Will Kurau, Ayaka and the GPO be able to stop him?

episodes.title: Sayonara no mae ni
episodes.plot: A lonely Christmas goes back to live with Uncle Frank and Aunt Kleine in Switzerland. Meanwhile, Kurau goes back to live with her father. We find out the real reason that Kurau loved the Christmas holiday.
